name: Carlo's Trip in the Underworld
description:
Hi everyone!
This is a small platform-puzzle game where you have to reach the end of each area with Carlo by using your Laser Hook in different ways!

CONTROLS

!WARNING! In game press the RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to take rewind your hook, not the left mouse button as told in the tutorial 1.

A and W to move
SPACE to jump
E to interact with signs
F to zoom out
ESC to pause

CREDITS 

Graphical assets made my teammate (some tiles inspired to https://www.pngwing.com/en/free-png-xrrmb)

Music by Retro Indie Josh 

Contains music ©2022 Retro Indie Josh (https://retroindiejosh.itch.io) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

Contains sfx from https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx`

Font used: https://www.dafont.com/minecraft.font
